snippet: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel called his Palestinian counterpart on Friday on Eid-al-Fitr, the first time the two leaders have spoken in more than a year.
abstract: Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu calls Palestinian Authority Pres Mahmoud Abbas on Eid al-Fit, saying he told Abbas citizens of Israel want peace and stability; is first direct contact between the two leaders since summer of 2014.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel called his Palestinian counterpart on Friday on Eid-al-Fitr, the first time the two leaders have spoken in more than a year.

headline.main: Israel: Netanyahu and Abbas Talk by Phone After Year
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Israel: Netanyahu and Abbas Talk by Phone After Year
